document_data.name: The Valiant Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Valiant Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Valiant''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|22}}
document_data.Activities:
This mamluk organization specialized in engaging enemies with quick lightning strikes.

Several platoons of the Valiant were stationed within the [[Chamber of Judges]] to guard the ''qadi'' and scribes working their and to maintain order.

The Valiant maintained a large contingent in the [[North Center]] of [[Huzuz]] to aid in security and monitor the caravans entering the city through that ward.
document_data.Organization: The Valiant were led by General [[Kalin Abd al-Bas]].
document_data.Base of Operations: [[Qudra]] served as the main base for this group, though they maintained units within Huzuz and [[Utaqa]] as well.
